column4: anyone got any ideas? I cant connect to the internet via my ubuntu's firefox or any other app, but I can ping and resolve the www.google.com
do you have to run through a proxy or anything?
that shouldnt matter then, if you had to go through a proxy it would need to be set within the browser but i dont think thats the case
its a resolving issue for sure, I dont know much about it but check that your dns is correct for sure
